home.placeholder: What are you putting off right now?
home.taskInputError: Enter a task or pick a tag below
home.pleaseEnterTask: Please enter your task. AI will call you to remind!
home.timePastConfirm: The selected time has passed. Set it for tomorrow at the same time?
home.testVersionNote: Please note that the phone-call reminder feature is only available on iOS or Android. If you are interested, you can click below to request a test version, and the developer will send you an email.
home.requestSent: Request Sent! We'll contact you soon.
home.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
home.submitFailed: Failed to submit request. Please try again.
home.exampleClickHint: This is an example. Create your own task above!
home.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
home.taskInputHint: Enter what you want to do first, then set the time.
stats.completeTasksHint: Complete some tasks in the Home tab!
profile.title: Profile
profile.nameHint: Lumi will call you by this name
profile.makerIntro: Hey, I'm Miko. I have ADHD and I'm honestly tired of habit apps that make me feel guilty for being human.
profile.makerAdhd: I'm trying to fix the "start strong, quit in a week" cycle, but I don't have all the answers yet.
profile.makerDream: If you're in the SF Bay Area, let me buy you a coffee! ☕️
profile.makerHope: I have nothing to sell. I just want to hear your story and learn how you handle this stuff.
profile.feedbackTitle: Trying to help ADHDers actually start tasks.
profile.feedbackBody: I'm struggling to figure out the fine line between a "helpful partner" and an "annoying nag." If you need a push to get started but hate being bossed around, how do you handle this? I'd love your advice.
profile.saveFailed: Failed to save name. Please try again.
profile.feedbackFailed: Failed to send feedback. Please try again.
auth.signInPrompt: Sign in or create an account to continue
auth.termsAgree: By continuing, you agree to our
onboarding.signInDesc: Sign in with Google or email to save tasks and rewards.
onboarding.emailLoginHint: Enter email and password after redirect
onboarding.termsAgree: By signing in, you agree to Lumi's
onboarding.appleLoginFailed: Apple login failed, please try again
language.title: Lumi's Voice Language
language.description: Choose the language Lumi speaks. Auto-detect will match your speech.
uiLanguage.title: App Language
uiLanguage.description: Choose the language for app interface and text.
profile.aiVoiceDescription: Choose the voice gender for Lumi
profile.aiToneHint: How should Lumi talk to you?
profile.aiToneDescription: Choose how Lumi communicates with you
feedback.title: Thank you for your feedback!
feedback.interviewInvite: If you're open to a 15-minute chat, I'd love to buy you a coffee ($5) as a thank you. Your insights mean the world to me!
feedback.emailPrompt: Please leave your email so I can contact you for the coffee chat!
feedback.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
feedback.thanksSoon: Thanks! I'll reach out to you soon.
urgency.emptyWarning: You need to enter the task you want to do
leaderboard.comingSoonHint: The leaderboard experience is on the way. Stay tuned!
habitOnboarding.welcome.title: Hi, I'm Lumi
habitOnboarding.welcome.subtitle: Let's build your first habit today.
habitOnboarding.habitSelect.title: What habit do you want to start?
habitOnboarding.customHabit.title: Enter your habit
habitOnboarding.timeSelect.title: When should I remind you?
habitOnboarding.howItWorks.title: At your chosen time, I'll call you with a short video reminder.
habitOnboarding.permissions.title: Enable Permissions
habitOnboarding.permissions.description: To receive video calls from your AI coach, please allow these permissions.
habitOnboarding.permissions.cameraHint: Let AI see and guide your actions
habitOnboarding.nameInput.title: What should Lumi call you?
habitOnboarding.nameInput.subtitle: Enter your preferred name
habitOnboarding.nameInput.errorSave: Failed to save name. Please try again.
habitOnboarding.languageSelect.title: What language should Lumi speak?
habitOnboarding.languageSelect.subtitle: You can select multiple
habitOnboarding.voiceSelect.title: Should Lumi be a boy or girl?
habitOnboarding.voiceSelect.subtitle: Tap the play button to preview
habitOnboarding.tryNow.title: Ready to try?
habitOnboarding.tryNow.description: I can call you now for a quick 5-minute session.
habitOnboarding.referralSource.title: How did you hear about Lumi?
habitOnboarding.referralSource.subtitle: This helps us improve
habitOnboarding.done.title: All set!
habitOnboarding.done.subtitle: Your habit is ready. Let's go!
permissions.notification.title: Timely Reminders
permissions.notification.description: I'll call you at your scheduled time to help you stay on track.
permissions.notification.denied: Permission denied. Please enable notifications in your browser settings and try again.
permissions.microphone.title: Voice Conversation
permissions.microphone.description: Lumi will guide you step by step to success. Please allow microphone access to talk with Lumi.
permissions.microphone.denied: Permission denied. Please enable microphone in your browser settings and try again.
permissions.camera.title: Visual Coaching
permissions.camera.description: Lumi can observe your actions to encourage and guide you. Please allow camera access.
permissions.camera.denied: Permission denied. Please enable camera in your browser settings and try again.
permissions.alertHintTapEnable: Tap 'Enable' for each permission to allow access.
permissions.alertHintNative: Tap 'Open Settings' to enable permissions in your device settings.
permissions.alertHintWeb: Please refresh the page and allow permissions when prompted.
permissions.skipWarning.title: Permission Required
permissions.skipWarning.message: Without this permission, AI video calls may not work properly. You can enable it later in your device settings.
permissions.review.notification.title: Don't Miss Reminders
permissions.review.notification.descript: AI needs this to video call you at your scheduled time.
permissions.review.notification.denied: Please enable notifications in Settings to receive call reminders.
permissions.review.microphone.title: Voice Conversation
permissions.review.microphone.descriptio: AI talks with you to guide you step by step into action.
permissions.review.microphone.denied: Please enable microphone in Settings to have voice conversations.
permissions.review.camera.title: Visual Coaching
permissions.review.camera.description: AI sees you to help you start with the simplest small step.
permissions.review.camera.denied: Please enable camera in Settings to have video calls.
profile.permissions.title: Device Permissions
profile.permissions.subtitle: Required for AI video calls
profile.permissions.warning: Without these permissions, AI cannot make video calls to help you beat procrastination.
profile.permissions.allEnabledMessage: All permissions enabled! AI is ready to video call you.
profile.permissions.privacyNote: Audio and video data are processed in real-time and are not stored on our servers. We comply with GDPR and other international privacy regulations.
profile.permissions.sleepFocusLong: iOS Sleep Focus blocks all notifications by default. Without this, Lumi cannot remind you to go to bed or wake up on time.
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
profile.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
profile.communityHint: Make friends, body double, have fun!
tour.step1.title: Enter your task
tour.step1.content: First, you can enter your task here, or pick a quick tag from below.
tour.step2.title: Set reminder time
tour.step2.content: After entering your task, tap here to set a reminder time.
tour.step3.title: Your first habit
tour.step3.content: This habit will remind you daily at {{time}}. You can edit or delete it.
tour.step4.title: Check-in records
tour.step4.content: Your habit check-in records will be shown here.
tour.step5.title: Start now
tour.step5.content: Want to start right away? Enter your task here and tap the Start button below!
profile.healthKit.title: Health Data
profile.healthKit.subtitle: Synced from Apple Health
profile.healthKit.noDataDesc: No health data found. Sync from your iPhone to get started.
profile.healthKit.privacyNote: Your health data is stored securely and only accessible by you. We never share or sell your personal health information.
